00145 int nfs_Remove(  nfs_arg_t               * parg    /* IN  */,
00146                  exportlist_t            * pexport /* IN  */,
00147                  fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext   /* IN  */,
00148                  cache_inode_client_t    * pclient /* IN  */,
00149                  hash_table_t            * ht      /* INOUT */,
00150                  struct svc_req          * preq    /* IN  */,
00151                  nfs_res_t               * pres    /* OUT */ ) 
00152 {
00153         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Remove";
00154   
00155   cache_entry_t          * parent_pentry = NULL ;
00156   cache_entry_t          * pentry_child  = NULL ;
00157   fsal_attrib_list_t       pre_parent_attr      ;
00158   fsal_attrib_list_t       pentry_child_attr    ;
00159   fsal_attrib_list_t       parent_attr          ;
00160   fsal_attrib_list_t     * pparent_attr = NULL  ;
00161   cache_inode_file_type_t  filetype             ;
00162   cache_inode_file_type_t  childtype            ;
00163   cache_inode_status_t     cache_status         ; 
00164   int                      rc                   ;
00165   fsal_path_t              symlink_data         ;
00166   char                   * file_name  = NULL    ;
00167   fsal_name_t              name ;
00168 
00169         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00170     {
00171                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00172                 pres->res_remove3.REMOVE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00173                 pres->res_remove3.REMOVE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00174     pparent_attr = NULL ;
00175         }
00176   
00177   /* Convert file handle into a pentry */
00178   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00179                                             &(parg->arg_readlink2),
00180                                             &(parg->arg_readlink3.symlink),
00181                                             NULL, 
00182                                             &(pres->res_readlink2.status),
00183                                             &(pres->res_readlink3.status),
00184                                             NULL, 
00185                                             &pre_parent_attr, 
00186                                             pcontext, 
00187                                             pclient, 
00188                                             ht, 
00189                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00190     {
00191       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00192       return rc ;
00193     }
00194   
00195         /* get directory attributes before action (for V3 reply) */
00196   pparent_attr = &pre_parent_attr ;
00197 
00198   /* Extract the filetype */
00199   filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pre_parent_attr.type ) ;
00200   
00201         /*
00202          * Sanity checks: new directory name must be non-null; parent must be
00203          * a directory. 
00204          */
00205   if( filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00206     {
00207       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00208         {
00209         case NFS_V2:
00210           pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00211           break;
00212 
00213         case NFS_V3:
00214           pres->res_remove3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00215                                 break;
00216         }
00217       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00218     }
00219 
00220         switch (preq->rq_vers)
00221     {
00222     case NFS_V2:
00223       file_name = parg->arg_remove2.name;
00224                   break;
00225     case NFS_V3:
00226       file_name = parg->arg_remove3.object.name;
00227                   break;
00228     }
00229   
00230         if (file_name == NULL || strlen(file_name) == 0)
00231           {
00232             cache_status = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT;        /* for lack of better... */
00233           } 
00234         else
00235           {
00236             
00237       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( file_name, 
00238                                                                      FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00239                                                                      &name ) ) ) ==  CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00240         {
00241           /*
00242            * Lookup to the child entry to check if it is a directory 
00243            *
00244            */
00245           if( ( pentry_child = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, 
00246                                                    &name, 
00247                                                    &pentry_child_attr, 
00248                                                    ht, 
00249                                                    pclient, 
00250                                                    pcontext, 
00251                                                    &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00252             {
00253               /* Extract the filetype */
00254               childtype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pentry_child_attr.type ) ;
00255 
00256               /*
00257                * Sanity check: make sure we are about to remove a directory 
00258                */
00259               if( childtype == DIR_BEGINNING || childtype == DIR_CONTINUE )
00260                 {
00261                   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00262                     {
00263                     case NFS_V2:
00264                       pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_ISDIR;
00265                       break;
00266                       
00267                     case NFS_V3:
00268                       pres->res_remove3.status = NFS3ERR_ISDIR;
00269                       break;
00270                     }
00271                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00272                 }
00273 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00274               printf( "==== NFS REMOVE ====> Trying to remove file %s\n", name.name ) ;
00275 #endif
00276               /*
00277                * Remove the entry. 
00278                */
00279               if( cache_inode_remove( parent_pentry, 
00280                                       &name, 
00281                                       &parent_attr, 
00282                                       ht, 
00283                                       pclient, 
00284                                       pcontext, 
00285                                       &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00286                 {
00287                   switch( preq->rq_vers )
00288                     {
00289                     case NFS_V2:
00290                       pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00291                       break;
00292                       
00293                     case NFS_V3:
00294                       /* Build Weak Cache Coherency data */
00295                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00296                                       parent_pentry, 
00297                                       pparent_attr, 
00298                                       &parent_attr,
00299                                       &(pres->res_remove3.REMOVE3res_u.resok.dir_wcc) );
00300                       
00301                       pres->res_remove3.status = NFS3_OK;
00302                       break;
00303                     }
00304                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00305                 }
00306             }
00307         }
00308     }
00309   
00310         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00311         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00312                        preq->rq_vers, 
00313                        cache_status,
00314                        &pres->res_stat2,
00315                        &pres->res_remove3.status,
00316                        NULL, NULL,
00317                        parent_pentry,
00318                        pparent_attr, 
00319                        &(pres->res_remove3.REMOVE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00320                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00321         
00322   if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00323           {
00324             return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00325           }
00326         
00327         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00328 } /* nfs_Remove */
00329 
00338 void nfs_Remove_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00339 {
00340   /* Nothing to do here */
00341   return ;
00342 } /* nfs_Remove_Free */
